name: Bryant_Home_Power_Reclining_Sofa
description:
Add a sleek, modern look to your living area with this elegant power reclining sofa. Simple, sophisticated and functional, this beautiful reclining sofa is upholstered in a gorgeous black bonded leather, making it the perfect addition to any modern decor style. The power recline feature allows you to easily kick back and relax, while the foam filling and spring coils offer comfort and support.
Model: Bryant Power SofaMaterials: Bonded leather, plywood, larch, foam, fiber, spring coilsFill material: Foam, fiber, spring coilsUpholstery material: Bonded LeatherUpholstery color: BlackPower ReclinerInner dimensions: 40 inches high x 78 inches wide x 37 inches deepSofa dimensions: 40 inches high x 78 inches wide x 37 inches deepStyleContemporaryMaterialBonded Leather, Foam, Leather, WoodTypeSofaFinishBlack, WoodAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrownFurniture PatternSolidProduct FeaturesPower Recline
